answers.author: Trey Williams
answers.text:
Brian,
Yuma County, Arizona has general election candidate information located at this URL: http://www.yumacountyaz.gov/index.aspx?page=836. They utilize it as a packet where candidates can find information on filing, state and federal regulations, and campaign finance. It is not necessarily a document but a webpage where candidates can visit for information and documents.

author: Brian Silcott
text:
If you jurisdiction has governing body candidate orientation material for individuals running for office I'd appreciate a copy. 
Thank you for your consideration of this request.
Brian
title: Governing Body Candidate Orientation Material
